title: Poskim Reject Draft Law
body: Leading poskim and rabbonim from the Chug Chazon Ish circle, led by Rav Moshe Sternbuch, issued a powerful psak opposing the government's draft legislation, deeming it forbidden to agree to any law that would enlist chareidi community members.

title: Expert Seeks Halachic Guidance
body: Dr. Sherman Silber, a world-renowned fertility expert, consulted with senior posek Rav Moshe Shternbuch in Yerushalayim on new medical methods for infertility.
